overview: 11-graders Anya and Sasha are already dreaming of a future life together in their small provincial town. While preparing for the last bell ceremony, Anya learns that her boyfriend Sasha, who dreams of becoming an architect, has won a grant to study in the cultural capital. Will Sasha leave to fulfill his dream or will he decide to stay in his native place with a person who cares for him?
title: Last Bell
